title: Static Force Directed Graph
description: A culmination of different types of visualizations. Aimed at showing an abstract view of how money flows across different heads of accounts. At the core of the visualization is the static force layout graph. Circles as elements added to aid the flow effect. The aim of the visualization to help general audience gain interest in how budgets work.

title: Animated Bubble Chart
prod_example: Outlay on Major Schemes, Union Expenditure Profile
description: Bubble Chart with clustering using different parameter. The visualization provides interactivity to view bubbles in different clusters.

title: 3 Column Balance
description: 3 Column layout to display information. This layout symbolises the balance aspect. This is not a visualisation but a layout to present sub-visualisations.

title: Group Bar Chart
description: Group Bar Chart with Sidebar. The visualizations offers feature to select and deselect series. Tooltip is also provided to provide extra information.

title: Hierarchial Bar Chart
description: Hierarchial Bar Chart to showcase hiearchies. The hierarchial can be navigaated by clicking on the bars, empty space area or sidebar records.

title: Bar Chart with Negative Values
description: Sorted Horizontal Bar Chart with Negative Values. Ideal for showing trends across records with the accuracy in estimation of bar charts. Ideal for viewing spectrum of values.

title: Sunburst
description: Simple Sunburst to visualize hierarchies. While it can be quite fancy to view, but visualizations is a little unconventional for non-tech audience like traditional budget researchers.

title: Mutliseries Line Chart
description: Mutliseries Line Chart with option to select and deselect series. The visualisations also offers a sub scale to select an interval.
